entry.title: [FF] Anyone here ever listened to the podcast Decoding the Gurus? [They have a new ep
entry.content: Anyone here ever listened to the podcast Decoding the Gurus? [They have a new episode on Lex Friedman and Jonathan Heidt.](https://decoding-the-gurus.captivate.fm/episode/lex-fridman-jonathan-haidt-the-techno-monk-the-social-scientist)
